titles.title: Seafood Marketing Act of 2022
Seafood Marketing Act of 2022
A bill to provide for the reestablishment of the National Fish and Seafood Promotional Council, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Seafood Marketing Act of 2022
This bill provides for the reestablishment of the National Fish and Seafood Promotional Council until December 31, 2027. It also modifies qualifications for voting members of the council.
Additionally, the bill also provides statutory authority for a definition of seafood to include finfish, mollusks, crustaceans, seaweed, and all other forms of aquatic life used for human consumption.
